Here's a penguin:

```{r}
options(repos = c(CRAN = "https://cloud.r-project.org"))
install.packages("ggplot2")

library(ggplot2)

# Penguin Body
penguin_body <- data.frame(x = c(0, 0), y = c(0, 0))
p <- ggplot(penguin_body, aes(x, y)) +
  geom_point() +
  annotate("path", 
           x = c(1, 1.5, 2, 1.5, 1, 0.5, 0, 0.5, 1), 
           y = c(0, 0.5, 1, 2, 3, 2, 1, 0.5, 0), 
           colour = "black", size = 2, fill = "black") +
  theme_void()

# Eyes
p <- p + annotate("point", x = 1.25, y = 2.25, colour = "white", size = 3)
p <- p + annotate("point", x = 0.75, y = 2.25, colour = "white", size = 3)

# Beak
p <- p + annotate("segment", x = 1, xend = 1.5, y = 1.5, yend = 1.5, colour = "orange", size = 2)

# Display the Penguin
p
```
